summary: This document appears to be an internal list of committee members and their functional titles at Deutsche Bank, specifically related to the Americas region. It includes names, roles, and legal entities associated with each member, indicating their positions within the bank's organizational structure.

persons.name: Stuart Clarke
persons.context: Stuart Clarke is listed as the Vice Chairman and Chief Operating Officer for Deutsche Bank Americas Holding Corp.

persons.name: Steven Reich
persons.context: Steven Reich serves as the General Legal Counsel for Deutsche Bank AG, New York Branch.

persons.name: Francis Kelly
persons.context: Francis Kelly is the Global Coordinator for Public Affairs and Head of Government Relations & Public Affairs for North & Latin America at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.

persons.name: Eric Smith
persons.context: Eric Smith holds the position of Chief Financial Officer for Deutsche Bank AG, New York Branch.

persons.name: Jan Ford
persons.context: Jan Ford is the Head of Compliance for Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.

persons.name: Jan Bomebusch
persons.context: Jan Bomebusch serves as the Head of Anti-Financial Crime for Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.

persons.name: Jonathan Hummel
persons.context: Jonathan Hummel is the Head of Funds, Clearinghouses & Exchanges for Deutsche Bank AG, New York Branch.

persons.name: Carol Saracco
persons.context: Carol Saracco is the Secretary and Head of Regional Corporate Governance for Deutsche Bank Americas Holding Corp.

keyFacts: The document lists various committee members and their roles within Deutsche Bank, specifically in the Americas region.
It includes titles such as Chief Risk Officer, Chief Operating Officer, General Legal Counsel, and others.
There are no notable events or incidents referenced in this document.
